#summary validatesNumericalityOf(property[message,when,allowBlank,onlyInteger])
#labels api,0.9

*Category*:

[ModelInitializationFunctions Model Initialization Functions]

*Description*:

Validates that the value of the specified property is numeric.

*Return Type*:

Void

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *property* || string || true || - || See documentation for `validatesExclusionOf` ||
|| *message* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `validatesExclusionOf` ||
|| *when* || string || false || onSave || See documentation for `validatesExclusionOf` ||
|| *allowBlank* || boolean || false || false || See documentation for `validatesExclusionOf` ||
|| *onlyInteger* || boolean || false || false || Specifies whether the property value has to be an integer ||
|| *maximum* || numeric || false || 0 || The maximum length that the property value has to be ||
|| *minimum* || snumeric || false || 0 || The minimum length that the property value has to be ||
|| *within* || string || false ||   || A list of two values (minimum and maximum) that the length of the property value has to fall within ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- in models/User.cfc --->
<cffunction name="init">
  <cfset validatesNumericalityOf(property="score", onlyInteger=true, message="Please enter a correct score.")>
</cffunction>
}}}
